name: SWITCH (dawidk, Kostrzewak26)
description:
Hello,

this is our first game jam project and first published game ever :)

We completed only one tutorial level at the appointed time. This level shows basic gameplay and mood of our game.

We strongly advise playing with a game controller but SWITCH also supports keyboard

Have fun :)

Kacper & Dawid Kostrzewa

Art - Kacper Kostrzewa (kostrzewak26)

Programming - Dawid Kostrzewa

Game Design and System Design - Kacper & Dawid Kostrzewa
